ambient.body: Our digital solutions centralized this healthcare organization's unstructured "dark data." This enterprise-wide visibility prevented erroneous pension payments, elevated records management, and created a searchable, compliant digital core for ongoing operational improvement.
ambient.headline: A global healthcare company mitigates risk and saves millions by finding certainty and clarity in its pension administration.
ambient.title:
Information 
& data lifecycle

challengeMain.body: A large healthcare organization faced significant financial risk because it could not locate the appropriate documentation to confirm the eligibility of employee pension claims. The legal system ruled the organization liable to pay claims without evidence to disprove eligibility, resulting in millions of dollars paid in ineligible pension benefits.
challengeMain.featuredStat1Body: saved annually through the identification of "duplicate" pension payments
challengeMain.item1Body: Disparate, unstructured records across various locations and legacy systems—including paper, microfilm, CD, and digital formats—created costly, risk-laden pension administration.
challengeMain.item2Body: After multiple acquisitions with antiquated and disordered records, finding the required regulatory documentation was difficult to impossible.

solutionMain.headline: A partnership with Iron Mountain
solutionMain.body: The organization turned to Iron Mountain for help, implementing InSightⓇ DXP. This created a unified platform for newly digitized documents and digitally-native records gathered from various departments and prior acquisitions.
numberedList: Converted all document formats (including handwritten papers, microfilm, CD/DVD) into digital form, then identified and extracted key data to enrich the records with searchable metadata
Created a complete repository of digitized and searchable pension information
Migrated legacy systems to InSight DXP to house all pension information

solutionGrid.headline: How the organization employed digital solutions:

valueMain.headline: Expanding possibilities
valueMain.body: The partnership with Iron Mountain and implementation of InSight DXP transitioned the organization from unknown to certainty and clarity in pension administration.

diamondBenefits.label: Operational benefits
bullets: Rendered an accessible, searchable system for pension employees to quickly answer employee and regulatory queries
Provided scalability for future growth, including adding additional automated intelligent document processing (IDP) workflows
Enabled the organization to validate paid claims faster and more accurately upon deployment

diamondBenefits.label: Economical benefits
bullets: Mitigated future financial risk, saving over $2 million annually by identifying "duplicate" pension payments
Saved over $1 million in claims liability upon deployment
Allowed the organization to audit existing paid claims and have documented evidence to return to the courts for relief from paying ineligible claims

diamondBenefits.label: Strategic benefits
bullets: Reduced financial and compliance risks through enhanced visibility into physical documentation and structured data
Easily integrated inherited physical and digital records from additional company acquisitions by following defined workflows in InSight DXP
Applied record retention disciplines to ensure efficient document management and minimize business risk
